trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A> property to determine which row changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>属性来确定更改了哪一行。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> property to determine which row state changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>属性来确定哪些行状态更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that has a changed state.
trans-unit.target: 更改了状态的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values indicating the state that has changed on the row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值之一，指示行的状态已更改。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the parameter values to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数使用的参数值来初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that has a changed state.
trans-unit.target: 获取更改了状态的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" /> that has a changed state.
trans-unit.target: 更改了状态的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state that has changed on the row.
trans-unit.target: 获取已更改的行状态。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values indicating the state that has changed on the row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> 值之一，指示行的状态已更改。
